data.name: ZOSU Zoo Home Passthrough
data.description:
Create an interactive Zoo in your home with over 60 animals!
- pass through enabled to see animals in your actual surroundings in mixed reality
- animals are placeable and moveable with random spawn options and deletion options
- variety of pre-made and customizable animal placements:
-- full sized animals
-- half sized animals
-- tabletop sized animals
- animals include: tigers, rhinos, hippos, lions, great white sharks, turtles, bears, zebras, deer, lizards, elephants, mountain goats, farm animals, dogs, cats, many birds, t-Rex and other dinosaurs, boars, leopards, and many more

Updates:
- new flying bird level
- added large animal level with no visual grab aids 
- added ability to switch hand models
- two new sea turtle levels, they include swimming turtles and baby turtle spawners!

changelog.change_log:
Added:
- dolphin level
- cuttle fish level
- experimental object duplication and enlargement level with slightly larger table top animals
- option to hide small animal level top tables
- jungle passthrough samples

Bug Fixes:
- now always have correct lobby spawn position
- improve FPS of table top level
- no longer step on animals in lobby and move vertically
- dialed in some smaller animal hit boxes

Changes:
- removed redundant blue button levels
- lobby animals not all floor
- note updated build SDK version used
- corrected some app permissions
Added 2 levels: stationary grabbable turtles and swimming turtles, both with turtle spawners!
Added 2 levels: flying birds, large animals with no grab visual aids.  Also updated with ability to toggle through different hands when using controllers (including one that uses arms).
